name: Clémence Poésy
description: French actress known for roles in Harry Potter and In Bruges.

content.title: Biography
content.body: Clémence Poésy was born in 1982 in L'Haÿ-les-Roses, France. She began her acting career on stage and appeared in French television films before gaining international recognition.

content.title: Career
content.body: Clémence is best known for her role as Fleur Delacour in the *Harry Potter* film series. Her performance in *In Bruges* alongside Colin Farrell and Brendan Gleeson showcased her versatility and earned her critical acclaim. She has also appeared in films such as *127 Hours* and *Tenet*. Poésy is noted for her nuanced performances and ability to tackle both dramatic and comedic roles.

content.title: Notable Collaborations
content.body: Clémence Poésy has worked frequently with notable directors including Christopher Nolan in *Tenet*.

content.title: Legacy
content.body: Clémence Poésy's work in both European and Hollywood films has cemented her place as a versatile and accomplished actress. Her role in the *Harry Potter* series has left a lasting impact on fans worldwide.
